In Troms√∏ you get on the Hurtigb√•t and then simply hop on or hop off where you want to go explore. Besides many ‚ÄúMust-See‚Äù locations like Bl√•isvannet and Lyngstuva above I also visited some hidden gems. Generally my days consisted of biking to a hiking location, hiking for a few hours, and then biking back to my cabin or tent for the night. As on these islands is very little traffic the cycling is super relaxed and enjoyable, and also on my hikes I did not meet many people.

I usually am very spoiled with good weather when on trips, though that wasn‚Äôt the case this time around.
